attributes.action: stand down immediately and call an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister or his government, there should be a vote for a one day National Strike to show the people's total distrust and disgust with the way this Prime Minister and his government are running this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
